description: This aromatic and spicy Thai green curry is a tasty and exciting dinner option.
keywords: Thai Style Green Curry with Kaffir Lime Leaves
name: Thai Style Green Curry with Kaffir Lime Leaves Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Now add the coconut milk and using a hand blender, blitz until smooth.Allow this all to simmer now until the sauce reduces to at least 1 third the size. Remove from the heat and store.
